en.title: Online Data Converter ‚Äî Bytes, Kilobytes, Megabytes

en.h2: Convert Bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB

overview.title: About Data Converter
overview.content: Our data converter allows you to quickly and accurately convert between different data measurement units. Supports all major units: bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, gigabytes, and terabytes.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All data units are converted through the base unit - byte. Uses binary system (1024-based), ensuring calculation accuracy for computer data.

units.title: Supported Units
units.content: The converter supports 5 main data units: bytes (B), kilobytes (KB), megabytes (MB), gigabytes (GB), and terabytes (TB).

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter
advantages.content: Accurate calculations, instant conversion, 4 languages support, user-friendly interface, mobile version.

faqItems.q: How many bytes are in a kilobyte?
faqItems.a: 1 kilobyte equals 1024 bytes. This is due to the binary system used in computers.

faqItems.q: How to convert gigabytes to megabytes?
faqItems.a: Multiply the number of gigabytes by 1024 to get megabytes. For example: 1 GB = 1 √ó 1024 = 1024 MB.

faqItems.q: What's the difference between kilobyte and kibibyte?
faqItems.a: Kilobyte (KB) = 1024 bytes, kibibyte (KiB) = 1024 bytes. Our converter uses the standard computer system (1024).

faqItems.q: How many terabytes are in a petabyte?
faqItems.a: 1 petabyte equals 1024 terabytes. This is the next unit of measurement after terabyte.
